Pesan Marc Marquez untuk Fans Balap Usai Tewasnya Afridza Munandar
04 Nov 2019, 11:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez, menyampaikan pesan kepada penggemar balap motor di seluruh dunia menyusul tewasnya rider muda Indonesia, Afridza Munandar, dalam balapan pertama Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC) di Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia, pada Sabtu (2/11/2019) lalu.
Afridza meninggal dunia usai mengalami kecelakaan hebat di Tikungan 1 pada lap pertama. Setelah mendapatkan pertolongan pertama dari petugas medis di tepi trek, ia segera ditransfer ke Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur dengan helikopter. Sayangnya, nyawa rider asal Tasikmalaya tersebut tak tertolong dalam usia 20 tahun.
Usai balapan kedua IATC digelar pada Minggu (3/11/2019), sesi mengheningkan cipta di grid dihadiri seluruh pebalap dan tim MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, dan IATC. Banyak pebalap juga memberikan tribut untuk Afridza usai finis di balapan masing-masing.
Dua di antaranya, Maverick Vinales dan Marquez, yang masing-masing menang dan finis kedua di MotoGP. Keduanya mendedikasikan kemenangan dan podium untuk Afridza beserta keluarganya. Usai finis, Marquez sekali lagi memberikan tribut untuk Afridza.

Marc Marquez's Message to Race Fans After Afridza Munandar's Death
Nov 04 2019, 11:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Repsol Honda rider Marc Marquez delivered a message to motor racing fans around the world following the death of young Indonesian rider Afridza Munandar in the first race of the Idemitsu Asia Talent Cup (IATC) at the Sepang Circuit, Malaysia, on Saturday (2 / 11/2019) then.
Afridza died after a severe accident at Bend 1 on the first lap. After getting first aid from a medical officer on the edge of the track, he was immediately transferred to Kuala Lumpur Hospital by helicopter. Unfortunately, the life of a rider from Tasikmalaya was not helped at the age of 20 years.
After the second race of the IATC was held on Sunday (3/11/2019), a moment of silence on the grid was attended by all the riders and the MotoGP, Moto2, Moto3, and IATC teams. Many riders also gave attributes for Afridza after finishing in their respective races.
Two of them, Maverick Vinales and Marquez, who each won and finished second in MotoGP. Both of them dedicated victory and the podium to Afridza and his family. After finishing, Marquez once again gave a tribute to Afridza.
